subject: Photography
title: Neon and Artificial Light
description: A fast breakdown of Neon and Artificial Light for builders.

hook.text: Neon signs cast electric pinks, greens, and blues across wet city streets. Artificial light is its own art form.

buildup.text: Artificial light sources â€” neon, LED, sodium vapor â€” each have distinctive color signatures.

discovery.text: Sodium street lamps cast sickly orange. LEDs can be any color. Neon tubes glow in vivid, saturated hues.

twist.text: Photographers once avoided artificial light. Now city-night and cyberpunk aesthetics celebrate it.

climax.text: Understanding artificial light means embracing its weirdness rather than correcting it away.

punchline.text: Artificial light isn't wrong. It's just different.
